summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to issue a permit to the owner of owners of all of Lot 4 and the north 54 feet of Lot 5, Block 141, and vacated street adjoining, in the plat of A. A. Denny's Broadway Addition to the City of Seattle, as recorded in Volume 6 of Plats, page 40; to construct and maintain one regulation driveway across the sidewalk on the west side of Broadway Court.
